title: A discourse concerning zeal against immorality and prophaness deliver'd in two sermons in St. Michaels Church Dublin, October 29, and November 26. 1699.
author: Hamilton, William, d. 1729.
publisher: printed by Joseph Ray in Skinner-Row, for Jacob Milner bookseller in Essex-Street,
notes: Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams' Library, London.
